about_the_game:
Pigsaw Human Abattoir is a HD reimagining of the world created in the indie viral hit, Pigsaw. Pigsaw HA will be a fleshed out and fully featured experience that retains the grit and gore of the original. There will be more of this dark and violent world to explore, more weapons to fight back with, and most importantly, more pigs and more saws.

Survive


Pigsaw is a bloody fever dream of first person shooter, survival horror, and stealth action. You are trapped in a nightmarish human abattoir. Use whatever is at your disposal and do what is necessary to stay alive, or run through the halls screaming if it all gets too much.

Fight


Smash in the brains of your oppressors with the increased variety of melee weapons that can be found. The trusty lead pipe from the original will make a return along with the throwable meat cleaver, and the butcher’s knife, perfect for stealthy takedowns to the throat.

Shoot


Various firearms can be found throughout the world of Pigsaw. A gas pressurized bolt gun is perfect for exacting swift execution on your captors, a shotgun if you want to go loud and get personal, or you could even “decommission” one of the various sentry turrets and then mince every damn pig in sight.

Explore


Explore the labyrinthine abattoir, plunging deep into its guts and churning underbelly. Those that make it far enough will find that other horrors dwell deep in the underdark of this colossal megastructure.

Rise Up


Free your fellow human cattle. Arm them and give them the means to fight back against the Butchers. Help them escape the slaughter and lead the uprising or die trying.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of violence, gore, and nudity.
